description: Couchbase Model Context Protocol Server to interact with Couchbase clusters

CB_CONNECTION_STRING.description: Couchbase connection string. Required for connecting to the cluster.

CB_USERNAME.description: Couchbase database username. Required for basic authentication.

CB_PASSWORD.description: Couchbase database password. Required for basic authentication.

CB_CA_CERT_PATH.description: Couchbase CA certificate path. Required for TLS authentication in non Capella clusters.

CB_CLIENT_CERT_PATH.description: Couchbase client certificate path. Required for mTLS authentication.

CB_CLIENT_KEY_PATH.description: Couchbase client key path. Required for mTLS authentication.

CB_MCP_READ_ONLY_QUERY_MODE.description: Couchbase read only query mode. Set to true to allow only read-only queries. Set to false to allow data modification queries.

CB_MCP_TRANSPORT.description: Transport mode for the server (stdio, http or sse). Default is stdio

CB_MCP_HOST.description: Host to run the MCP server on (default: 127.0.0.1). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.

CB_MCP_PORT.description: Port to run the MCP server on (default: 8000). Used only for HTTP and SSE transport modes.
